Task: Writing a review for a fast food place

QApair.Question: What was your experience like at McDonald's?
QApair.Answer: I had a great experience at McDonald's! The food was fresh and delicious, and the service was amazing. I will definitely be back! Additionally, the wait time was so less. The atmosphere was fun and the employees were very friendly and accommodating.

QApair.Question: What did you order at McDonald's?
QApair.Answer: I ordered a Big Mac with fries and a Coke. I also told them not to add onions in my Big Mac as I am allergic to onions. They made it separately for me.

QApair.Question: Did you enjoy your meal?
QApair.Answer: I absolutely enjoyed my meal! As I said, the food was fresh and delicious. The fries were crispy and the Coke was ice-cold. I was really impressed with how quickly they made my food, considering I asked them to hold the onions. Overall, I had a great experience at McDonald's and would definitely recommend it to others. The food is great, the service is wonderful, and the wait time is minimal. Thank you, McDonald's, for a great experience!

QApair.Question: Would you like to visit McDonald's again?
QApair.Answer: Yes, I would definitely like to visit McDonald's again. I had such a great experience that I would definitely recommend it to others. Thanks, McDonald's, for a great experience! Additionally, the place was jam packed and there were a lot of customers justifying the quality of food and service provided by McDonald's. I would like to visit the kitchen of a branch someday.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite thing about McDonald's?
QApair.Answer: My favorite thing about McDonald's is the food. The Big Mac is my favorite burger ever, and the fries are always crispy and delicious. I also really appreciate how accommodating the employees are - they made my burger without onions even though I didn't ask for it until I was already at the register. Additionally, I didn't want any ice in my coke which they accounted for.

QApair.Question: What is your least favorite thing about McDonald's?
QApair.Answer: I don't really have a least favorite thing about McDonald's. I had a great experience overall and would definitely recommend it to others. Although, I would like to point out that the restroom was out of service which made it a really tough time for me.

QApair.Question: Would you recommend McDonald's to your friends and family?
QApair.Answer: Yes, I would definitely recommend McDonald's to my friends and family. I had a great experience and the food was delicious. Additionally, the wait time was so less. The atmosphere was fun and the employees were very friendly and accommodating. I would like to start visiting McDonald's regularly with my friends and family to grab a small bite.

QApair.Question: Is there anything else you would like to add about your experience at McDonald's?
QApair.Answer: Yes, the service was good, the food was good, but the place was not that clean which made me rethink about visiting there again. I think it is dependent on the branch specifically.

QApair.Question: Would you like to visit McDonald's again?
QApair.Answer: Yes, I would like to visit McDonald's again but I would like to visit a different branch to see if the experience is different. I think I would go in and see if the branch is clean. If it is, then I will go in and grab something to eat. Also, I would like to try other things on the menu as well.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite thing about McDonald's?
QApair.Answer: My favorite thing about McDonald's is the price. I think it is really affordable to eat there. I also like how there are a lot of different things on the menu. I would like to try other things on the menu as well. Additionally, I like how the employees are really friendly and accommodating.

They made it separately for me. I absolutely enjoyed my meal! As I said, the food was fresh and delicious. The fries were crispy and the Coke was ice-cold. The food is great, the service is wonderful, and the wait time is minimal. Thank you, McDonald's, for a great experience!

QApair.Question: What was your experience like at Subway?
QApair.Answer: My experience at Subway was not good. The employees were rude and they did not make my sub properly. It was burnt and since I ordered a vegetarian sub, a burnt sub was the last thing I needed. The avocado was old and the lettuce was wilted. After all this I was asked to tip them and I did not feel any of this was worth my money.

QApair.Question: Would you recommend others to visit Subway?
QApair.Answer: I would not recommend anyone to visit Subway. The food is not good and the service is terrible. Save your money and go somewhere else. Save yourself from rude and unfriendly service at Subway. I would rather stay at home and eat anything else.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite fast food place?
QApair.Answer: I do not have a favorite fast food place. I used to like Subway but after my last experience, I do not think I will ever go back. It was horrible. I would rather go take the pain of cooking something up and eat that.

QApair.Question: What is your least favorite fast food place?
QApair.Answer: My least favorite fast food place would have to be Subway. The experience I had there was terrible. I will never go back and I would not recommend it to anyone. I was told by the employees to not give a public review about what happened but I am still going to write this review to show the people how bad Subway is.

QApair.Question: Would you ever visit Subway again?
QApair.Answer: No, I would not visit Subway again. It was the worst experience ever.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite fast food item?
QApair.Answer: I do not have a favorite fast food item. I wanted to try all the items on the subway menu and try all the different sub combinations but I don't think I will be doing that anymore.

QApair.Question: What is your least favorite fast food item?
QApair.Answer: I do not have a least favorite fast food item. In conclusion, I would not recommend anyone to visit Subway. The food is not good and the service is terrible. Save your money and go somewhere else.

QApair.Question: Would you ever visit Subway again?
QApair.Answer: No, I would not visit Subway again. It was the worst experience ever.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite fast food item?
QApair.Answer: I like pizza the most. I also like burgers but not as much as pizza.

It was burnt and since I ordered a vegetarian sub, a burnt sub was the last thing I needed. The avocado was old and the lettuce was wilted. After all this I was asked to tip them and I did not feel any of this was worth my money. I would not visit Subway again and I would not recommend it to anyone. The food is not good and the service is terrible. Save your money and go somewhere else.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite fast food restaurant?
QApair.Answer: Five Guys.

QApair.Question: What is your favorite menu item at Five Guys?
QApair.Answer: Bacon Cheeseburger. Fresh patties hot off the grill with American-style cheese and crispy apple-wood smoked bacon. Placed on a soft, toasted sesame seed bun. Choose as many toppings as you want.

QApair.Question: What do you think of the service at Five Guys?
QApair.Answer: The service is great. The staff is always friendly and accommodating.

QApair.Question: What do you think of the food at Five Guys?
QApair.Answer: The food is amazing. The burgers are cooked to perfection and the fries are some of the best I've ever had. Overall, I absolutely love Five Guys. The food is amazing, the service is great, and the atmosphere is perfect for a casual meal with friends. I would highly recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for a great fast food option. Additionally, I asked the employees to add some more cheese inside my burger. They happily did it for me. I was so glad.

QApair.Question: Do you have any suggestions on how Five Guys could improve?
QApair.Answer: I don't really have any suggestions on how they could improve. I think they're doing a great job already! Although, I would like to add that the restrooms should be cleaner than how I found them. But it's not really their fault as people come in all the time and use the restroom. They cannot be cleaning it everytime someone uses the restroom.

QApair.Question: Would you recommend Five Guys to others?
QApair.Answer: Yes, I would definitely recommend Five Guys to others. In fact, I would like to visit five guys regularly with friends and family to grab a bite and just gossip in general.

QApair.Question: Is there anything else you would like to add about your experience at Five Guys?
QApair.Answer: Yes, I would like to add that the place is immaculately clean and tidy. The employees are masked up and wear gloves while cooking. Safe distance is maintained. The kitchen looked hygienic from outside. These things gave me an assurance about the food at Five Guys.

QApair.Question: Do you have a photo of your experience at Five Guys that you would like to share?
QApair.Answer: Yes, I do have a photo that I would like to share. [attached photo]

QApair.Question: Would you like to leave a video review of your experience at Five Guys?
QApair.Answer: Yes, I would love to leave a video review. [attached video]

QApair.Question: What is your name?
QApair.Answer: My name is Raghupati. I am a professional food reviewer.

Instances.Output: I absolutely love Five Guys. The food is amazing, the service is great, and the atmosphere is perfect for a casual meal with friends. I would highly recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for a great fast food option. I ordered a bacon cheeseburger and it was cooked to perfection. The bun was soft and toasted, and the cheese was melted perfectly. The bacon was crispy and delicious. I was really impressed with how fresh and flavorful the burger was. The fries were also some of the best I've ever had. They were crispy on the outside and fluffy on the inside. The service at Five Guys was great. The staff was always friendly and accommodating. They were quick to take my order and get my food to me. I really appreciate the great service. Overall, I absolutely love Five Guys. The food is amazing, the service is great, and the atmosphere is perfect for a casual meal with friends. I would highly recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for a great fast food option.

Prompt.pre_question_prompt: I am an expert social media influencer. I will ask some questions to collect information and then I will use the information to write a review for a fast food place.
Prompt.task_specific_prompt: Write a review for a fast food place using the questions and answers above. Make it long and detailed.
